title: Scrolls
content: Magically charm a humanoid that you can see.A Charmed creature can't harm the charmer, and the charmer has advantage on Charisma checks against the creature. Scroll of Shatter Generate a painfully intense ringing noise that deals 3d8 Thunder damage to all nearby creatures and objects. Scroll of Cromatic Orb Hurl a sphere of energy.
